Sign up for {{< var vm.product >}} through AWS Marketplace to streamline billing and take advantage of your existing AWS relationship.


:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="70%" .pr3}
When you subscribe to {{< var vm.product >}} via AWS Marketplace, your usage is billed through your AWS account, simplifying procurement and consolidating your cloud spending.
:::

::: {.column width="30%" .pl3 .tr}
![](aws-marketplace-logo.png){fig-alt="AWS Marketplace logo" width=200px}
:::

::::

::: {.attn}

## Prerequisites

- [x] Your AWS account has permission to view the private {{< var vm.product >}} listing.
- [x] You have appropriate permissions in your AWS account to subscribe to Marketplace products.

:::

## Subscribe and set up your account

1. Open the {{< var vm.product >}} listing in AWS Marketplace.[^1]

2. Select **View subscription** and complete the subscription flow.

3. After subscribing, select **Set up account**.

   AWS sends a secure request to {{< var vm.product >}} confirming your purchase.

4. You are redirected to the {{< var vm.product >}} onboarding page with a one-time identifier that validates your Marketplace purchase:

![{{< var vm.product >}} onboarding page](validmind-onboarding-page.png){width=80% fig-alt="Screenshot of the ValidMind signup welcome screen where you onboard with your one-time identifier." .screenshot} 

5. Enter your details and complete registration.

   This step creates:

   - Your user account
   - A new {{< var vm.product >}} organization
   - Administrator access for the first user

6. After registration completes, you are redirected to the {{< var vm.product >}} login page.[^2]

   Sign in using the account you just created.

7. You are taken to the dashboard with your initial environment and sample content available.
